response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and unique features, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its market worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to sell the product to you for $950,000. This price reflects the product's high quality, rarity, and the significant savings compared to its original valuation. We are confident that this offer provides a mutually beneficial solution. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
